location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions: 125 x 95 mm. Foliation: the item is numbered 44A- 44D. These numbers are written in pencil and enclosed in a circle and appear on the top right hand corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: Christmas greeting card entitled 'GOOD WISHES’. The card has a coloured painting on folio 44A. Folio 44B verso has hand written greetings sent by Shaikh Mustapha Bin Abdul Latif to the Political Agent Percy Gordon Loch. Folio 44C has printed greetings and Christmas wishes. On folio 44 there is correspondence regarding the card.
